titleStmt.title: The subuersio[n] of Moris false foundacion where upon he sweteth to set faste and shove under his shameles shoris, to vnderproppe the popis churche: made by George Ioye.
Subversion of Moris false foundacion.
titleStmt.author: Joye, George, d. 1553.
